nodes.bodyText:
I wonder if a single line will work?

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+ARG BASE_IMAGE=centos:6
+
+FROM ${BASE_IMAGE}
+
+RUN yum install -y epel-release
+RUN yum install -y rpmrebuild

nodes.bodyText: nope, I tried :-) does not work since rpmrebuild would come from epel and needs that repo definition before yum starts.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+ARG BASE_IMAGE=centos:6
+
+FROM ${BASE_IMAGE}
+
+RUN yum install -y epel-release
+RUN yum install -y rpmrebuild
